query.pigql: q = load "${App.Datasets.Sales_Data2_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};q = filter q by date('SalesDate_Year', 'SalesDate_Month', 'SalesDate_Day') in ["1 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_SALES_REP_QUOTA.selection,["Account_SALES_REP"]).asEquality("Account_SALES_REP")}};q = filter q by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};t = load "${App.Datasets.Budget_Data_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";t = filter t by date('TargetDate_Year', 'TargetDate_Month', 'TargetDate_Day') in ["1 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_SALES_REP_QUOTA.selection,["Account_SALES_REP"]).asEquality("Account_SALES_REP")}};t = filter t by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};r = group q by ('Account_CUSTOMER','Account_CUSTOMER_SITE'), t by ('Account_CUSTOMER','Account_CUSTOMER_SITE');r = foreach r generate q['Account_CUSTOMER'] as 'Account_CUSTOMER', t['Account_CUSTOMER_SITE'] as 'Account_CUSTOMER_SITE', avg(q.'Account_LONG') as 'avg_Account_LONG', avg(q.'Account_LAT') as 'avg_Account_LAT', sum(t.Target) - sum(q.Amount) as 'sum_Quota';r = order r by 'sum_Quota' desc; r = filter r by 'sum_Quota' > 0;r = limit r 50;

q = load "${App.Datasets.Sales_Data2_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};q = filter q by date('SalesDate_Year', 'SalesDate_Month', 'SalesDate_Day') in ["1 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_SALES_REP_QUOTA.selection,["Account_SALES_REP"]).asEquality("Account_SALES_REP")}};q = filter q by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};t = load "${App.Datasets.Budget_Data_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";t = filter t by date('TargetDate_Year', 'TargetDate_Month', 'TargetDate_Day') in ["1 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_SALES_REP_QUOTA.selection,["Account_SALES_REP"]).asEquality("Account_SALES_REP")}};t = filter t by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};r = group q by ('Account_CUSTOMER','Account_CUSTOMER_SITE'), t by ('Account_CUSTOMER','Account_CUSTOMER_SITE');r = foreach r generate q['Account_CUSTOMER'] as 'Account_CUSTOMER', t['Account_CUSTOMER_SITE'] as 'Account_CUSTOMER_SITE', avg(q.'Account_LONG') as 'avg_Account_LONG', avg(q.'Account_LAT') as 'avg_Account_LAT', sum(t.Target) - sum(q.Amount) as 'sum_Quota';r = order r by 'sum_Quota' desc; r = filter r by 'sum_Quota' > 0;r = limit r 50;

q = load "${App.Datasets.Sales_Data2_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = filter q by date('SalesDate_Year', 'SalesDate_Month', 'SalesDate_Day') in ["1 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_SALES_REP_QUOTA.selection,["Account_SALES_REP"]).asEquality("Account_SALES_REP")}};q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};q = filter q by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};t = load "${App.Datasets.Budget_Data_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};t = filter t by date('TargetDate_Year', 'TargetDate_Month', 'TargetDate_Day') in ["1 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_SALES_REP_QUOTA.selection,["Account_SALES_REP"]).asEquality("Account_SALES_REP")}};t = filter t by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};r = group q by 'Account_STATE', t by 'Account_STATE';r = foreach r generate q.'Account_STATE' as 'Account_STATE', (sum(q.Amount)/sum(t.Target))*100 as 'sum_Quota';r = order r by 'sum_Quota' asc;

q = load "${App.Datasets.Sales_Data2_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};q = filter q by date('SalesDate_Year', 'SalesDate_Month', 'SalesDate_Day') in ["5 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_SALES_REP_QUOTA.selection,["Account_SALES_REP"]).asEquality("Account_SALES_REP")}};q = filter q by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_CUSTOMER_QUOTA.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER_SITE"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER_SITE")}};q = group q by ('SalesDate_Year', 'SalesDate_Month');q = foreach q generate 'SalesDate_Year' as 'Start_Year', 'SalesDate_Month' as 'Start_Month',  "Actual" as 'Type', sum('Amount') as 'Total';t = load "${App.Datasets.Budget_Data_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};t = filter t by date('TargetDate_Year', 'TargetDate_Month', 'TargetDate_Day') in ["5 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_SALES_REP_QUOTA.selection,["Account_SALES_REP"]).asEquality("Account_SALES_REP")}};t = filter t by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_CUSTOMER_QUOTA.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER_SITE"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER_SITE")}};t = group t by ('TargetDate_Year', 'TargetDate_Month');t = foreach t generate 'TargetDate_Year' as 'Start_Year', 'TargetDate_Month' as 'Start_Month', "Target" as 'Type', sum('Target') as 'Total';c = union t, q;c = group c by ('Start_Year', 'Start_Month', 'Type');c = foreach c generate 'Start_Year' + "~~~" + 'Start_Month' as 'SalesDate_Year~~~SalesDate_Month', 'Type' as 'Type', sum('Total') as 'sum_Total';

q = load "${App.Datasets.Sales_Data2_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};q = filter q by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};q = filter q by date('SalesDate_Year', 'SalesDate_Month', 'SalesDate_Day') in ["1 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];q = filter q by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};t = load "${App.Datasets.Budget_Data_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";t = filter t by date('TargetDate_Year', 'TargetDate_Month', 'TargetDate_Day') in ["1 quarter ago".."1 quarter ago"];t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};t = filter t by {{column(SAQL_REGION_QUOTA.selection,["Account_STATE"]).asEquality("Account_STATE")}};t = filter t by {{column(FILTER_CUSTOMER.selection,["Account_CUSTOMER"]).asEquality("Account_CUSTOMER")}};r = group q by 'Account_SALES_REP', t by 'Account_SALES_REP';r = foreach r generate q.'Account_SALES_REP' as 'Account_SALES_REP', (sum(q.Amount)/sum(t.Target))*100 as 'sum_Quota';r = order r by 'sum_Quota' asc;
